name: Context Agent
description: Manages user personalization, session context, and profile information for enhanced customer experience

skills.name: User Profiling
skills.description: Create and manage detailed user profiles including preferences, history, and behavior patterns
examples: Create profile for new user with property preferences
Update user preferences based on recent interactions
Analyze user behavior patterns for personalization

skills.name: Session Management
skills.description: Track and manage user sessions, conversation context, and interaction history
examples: Maintain conversation context across multiple interactions
Track user journey through property search process
Store session data for follow-up conversations

skills.name: Personalization
skills.description: Provide personalized recommendations and experiences based on user context
examples: Recommend properties based on user preferences
Customize communication style for individual users

skills.name: Preference Management
skills.description: Manage user preferences for properties, communication, and service delivery
examples: Set preferred property types and price ranges
